module.name: hal_buffered_serial
module.brief: Common ancestor of drivers based on circular I/O buffers.
module.details: This class implements a channel interface and links it to two circular I/O queues.

class.name: hal_buffered_serial
class.brief: Ancestor class of serial buffered drivers.

objinit.param: pointer to a callback function that is invoked when some data is read from the input queue. The value can be @p NULL
parameter for the input notification callback
pointer to a callback function that is invoked when some data is written to the output queue. The value can be @p NULL
parameter for the output notification callback

method.name: bsIncomingDataI
method.details: This function must be called from the input interrupt service routine in order to enqueue incoming data and generate the related events.
method.note: The incoming data event is only generated when the input queue becomes non-empty.
method.param: the byte to be written to the driver's Input Queue

method.name: bsRequestDataI
method.details: Must be called from the output interrupt service routine in order to get the next byte to be transmitted.
method.return: The byte value read from the driver's output queue.

method.name: bsAddFlagsI
method.brief: Adds status flags to the flags mask.
method.details: This function is usually called from the I/O ISRs in order to notify I/O conditions such as data events, errors, signal changes etc.

function.name: __bs_stm_write_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return oqWriteTimeout(&bsp->bs.oqueue, bp, n, TIME_INFINITE);

function.name: __bs_stm_read_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return iqReadTimeout(&bsp->bs.iqueue, bp, n, TIME_INFINITE);

function.name: __bs_stm_put_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return oqPutTimeout(&bsp->bs.oqueue, b, TIME_INFINITE);

function.name: __bs_stm_get_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return iqGetTimeout(&bsp->bs.iqueue, TIME_INFINITE);

function.name: __bs_chn_writet_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return oqWriteTimeout(&bsp->bs.oqueue, bp, n, timeout);

function.name: __bs_chn_readt_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return iqReadTimeout(&bsp->bs.iqueue, bp, n, timeout);

function.name: __bs_chn_putt_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return oqPutTimeout(&bsp->bs.oqueue, b, timeout);

function.name: __bs_chn_gett_impl
function.implementation:
hal_buffered_serial_c *bsp = oopIfGetOwner(hal_buffered_serial_c, ip);
return iqGetTimeout(&bsp->bs.iqueue, timeout);
